snippet: Adriana Trigiani lives where many of her novels are set, in Greenwich Village.
abstract: Novelist, sitcom writer and movie director Adriana Trigiani loves her four-story brick 1838 townhouse in the West Village for its high ceilings, fireplaces and period details; Trigiani says her home provides both sanctuary and a connection to her roots.
lead_paragraph: Adriana Trigiani lives where many of her novels are set, in Greenwich Village.
